abstract: Authorities accused the employee, Yihao Ben Pu, of illegally uploading sensitive information about Citadel's computer-driven trading strategies before attempting to destroy the evidence.
snippet: Authorities accused the employee, Yihao Ben Pu, of illegally uploading sensitive information about Citadel's computer-driven trading strategies before attempting to destroy the evidence.

headline.main: Ex-Citadel Employee Charged With Stealing Trade Secrets
